mapper.insert: insert into academy values((select *from (select max(seq)+1 from tbl_board) next), #{name}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{tel}, #{type1}, #{type2}, #{site}, #{logo}, #{info}, #{pic1}, #{pic2}, #{pic3}, #{pic4}, #{pic5}, 0.0, 0, #{target}, #{subject})
mapper.select: select aa.* from (select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS NO, a.* from acanews a, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) b where num = #{num} order by day desc)aa where aa.rnum <= #{end} and aa.rnum >= #{start}
